Please know ... you made the biggest impact today. He did not respond to you at the moment, but YOU WERE HEARD.

O ... my feeling of relief ... for now. For once, Flake did something right.

Vocabulary service announcement of the day:
faze (verb): to disturb or disconcert (someone)
phase (verb): to carry out (something) in gradual stages (noun): a distinct period in a process of change or forming part of something's development.
